alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; New Hanover; Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 5:00PM EDT until July 03 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern New Hanover County in southeastern North Carolina... Southwestern Pender County in southeastern North Carolina... Northeastern Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Phoenix, or near Leland, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Leland, Northwest, Batarora, Bishop, Town Creek, Phoenix, Winnabow, Belville, Navassa and Sandy Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
